page.title: 04Tourism: Poldark Mine Museum
page.content: At the end of Poldark Mine there are several museum rooms in which you will see lots of items which were used many years ago: the felt hats which the miners used to wear with candles on them, different tools which they used in the mine, such as picks, shovels and hammers. There are the shoes which the miners would have worn and a model of a Bal Maiden dressed as she would have been when she worked at the mine. There are lots of minerals and rocks and even a book in which the people who worked there had their names put down with how much pay they had. In one room there is an ultra-violet light, which makes some of the colours in the stones look very funny. I think the museum rooms are very interesting because they tell you about the old miners.
